segments.text: Hi , there . Look at these . I have collected some ads here . There is a special promotion for Mother's Day this weekend .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , yes . Mother's Day is coming . Do you plan to buy anything ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course . I want to buy some night cream for my mom , and some masques for myself .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hmm . In Carrefour , Clinique will be promoting their visible skin renewed cream .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: 180 yuan , and you can get a free 8 piece gift package .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What's included in the gift package ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Some black mascara , moisturizing orion , eye cream crystal lipstick , a two color eye shadow pack , styling hairspray , and a cosmetics bag .
segments.speaker: S2
